page.title: 17Houses Near Wigan
page.content: Our school is in a council estate of maisonettes, high rise flats and houses. Most of us live here. Recently, after less than 20 years some blocks of 5 storey flats were demolished because the area was overcrowded. Other child- ren live nearby in older terraced or semi-detached houses which some own. Inside our houses are lots of modern gadgets. We found that 75% of families own phones, 87% have 2 or more T.V. sets, 56% own a video, 78% a music centre, 59% a car and 87% have central heating. All mums have both a fridge and a washer. Of the children 25% own their own computer, 50% a radio and 50% their own cassette recorder. Free dinners are served to 66% of the child- ren. Most families in the area have 2 or 3 children but 6 of our families have 5 children. Nicola is the only girl who is an only child.
